scripts.setup: npm install && npm run build --workspaces && npm run db:generate && npm run db:init
scripts.vercel-build: npx prisma generate --schema=apps/backend/prisma/schema.prisma && npx prisma db push --schema=apps/backend/prisma/schema.prisma --accept-data-loss && npm run build --workspaces
scripts.dev: concurrently -n "SHARED,BACKEND,FRONTEND" -c "yellow,blue,magenta" "npm run dev -w packages/shared" "npm run dev -w apps/backend" "npm run dev -w apps/frontend"
